mapper.select: select order_no as orderNo, total_order_price as orderPrice, total_order_amount as totalAmount, total_used_point as usedPoint, total_pay_price as totalPrice, total_deposit_point as depositePoint, order_status as status, order_created_date as createdDate, customer_no as customerNo, order_address1 as address1, order_address2 as address2 from toy_order where customer_no = #{value}
select order_item_no as itemNo, order_no as orderNo, product_no as productNo, price_price as price, order_amount as amount, order_price as orderPrice from toy_order_items where order_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into toy_order (order_no, total_order_price, total_order_amount, total_used_point, total_pay_price, total_deposit_point, order_status, order_created_date, customer_no, order_address1, order_address2) values (order_seq.nextval, #{orderNo}, #{orderPrice}, #{totalAmount}, #{usedPoint}, #{totalPrice} , #{depositePoint} #{status},#{createdDate},#{customerNo},#{address1},#{address2})

insert into toy_order_items (order_item_no, order_no, product_no, price_price, order_amount, order_price) values (order_items_seq.nextval, #{orderNo}, #{productNo}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{orderPrice})
mapper.select: select CUSTOMER_ADDRESS1 as address1, CUSTOMER_ADDRESS2 as address2, CUSTOMER_POINT as userPoint from toy_customer where customer_id = #{userId}

select cart_no as itemNo, (select product_name from toy_products where product_no = toy_cart.product_no) as itemName, product_buy_price as price, (select product_Image from toy_products where product_no = toy_cart.product_no) as itemImage from toy_cart where product_no= #{itemNo}
